Courses

These are the courses I've taken this term! Wish me luck, haha!

CS2001
Database Management Systems (Core)
Introduction to databases, database management, and relevant topics like database security, integrity, concurrency, and data warehousing.
CS2003
Moder Application Development I (Core)
Html, CSS, Flask, Models, Controller, APIs and Rest APIs, Backend Systems, Application Security, Testing, etc.
SE2001
System Commands (Core)
Focuses on GNU/Linux OS: file management, shell programming, text processing, networking concepts, and Git as a version control system.
